parameter.expression: SELECT EMP.CODEMP||' - '||EMP.RAZAOSOCIAL AS LABEL, EMP.CODEMP AS VALUE FROM TSIEMP EMP WHERE EMP.AD_EMPGRUPO = 'S' ORDER BY EMP.CODEMP

simple-value.expression: SELECT TO_CHAR(DHULTEXEC, 'DD/MM/RRRR HH24:MI') AS DTHR FROM TSICND WHERE TABELA ='CND_DRE2'

grid.expression: WITH VALORES AS ( SELECT REFERENCIA, CODCENCUS, NROUNICOBP, AD_SKJV2, AD_CATEGORIA, CASE WHEN :P_ANALISE = 'U' THEN SUM(REC_BRUT_U) ELSE SUM(REC_BRUT_MC) END + CASE WHEN :P_ANALISE = 'M' THEN SUM(REPASSE) ELSE 0 END + SUM(EBIT) AS EBIT, CASE WHEN :P_ANALISE = 'U' THEN SUM(REC_BRUT_U) ELSE SUM(REC_BRUT_MC) END + CASE WHEN :P_ANALISE = 'M' THEN SUM(REPASSE) ELSE 0 END + SUM(EBTIDA) AS EBITDA, CASE WHEN :P_ANALISE = 'U' THEN SUM(REC_BRUT_U) ELSE SUM(REC_BRUT_MC) END + CASE WHEN :P_ANALISE = 'M' THEN SUM(REPASSE) ELSE 0 END + SUM(EBTIDAAJUS) AS EBITDAAJUS, CASE WHEN :P_ANALISE = 'U' THEN SUM(REC_BRUT_U) ELSE SUM(REC_BRUT_MC) END + CASE WHEN :P_ANALISE = 'M' THEN SUM(REPASSE) ELSE 0 END + SUM(REC_LIQ) AS RECLIQ, CASE WHEN :P_ANALISE = 'U' THEN SUM(REC_BRUT_U) ELSE SUM(REC_BRUT_MC) END + CASE WHEN :P_ANALISE = 'M' THEN SUM(REPASSE) ELSE 0 END + SUM(LCR_BRUTO) AS LUCRO_BRUTO, CASE WHEN :P_ANALISE = 'U' THEN SUM(REC_BRUT_U) ELSE SUM(REC_BRUT_MC) END AS REC_BRUTA, CASE WHEN :P_ANALISE = 'M' THEN SUM(REPASSE) ELSE 0 END + SUM(DEDUTORES) AS DEDUTORES, CASE WHEN :P_ANALISE = 'U' THEN SUM(REC_BRUT_U) ELSE SUM(REC_BRUT_MC) END + CASE WHEN :P_ANALISE = 'M' THEN SUM(REPASSE) ELSE 0 END + SUM(NVL(LCR_OPER, 0)) AS LUCRO_OP, CASE WHEN :P_ANALISE = 'U' THEN SUM(REC_BRUT_U) ELSE SUM(REC_BRUT_MC) END + CASE WHEN :P_ANALISE = 'M' THEN SUM(REPASSE) ELSE 0 END + SUM(LCR_ANTES_IR_CSLL) AS LAIR, CASE WHEN :P_ANALISE = 'U' THEN SUM(REC_BRUT_U) ELSE SUM(REC_BRUT_MC) END + CASE WHEN :P_ANALISE = 'M' THEN SUM(REPASSE) ELSE 0 END + SUM(LCR_LIQ) AS LUCRO_LIQ, SUM(AJUSTES) AS AJUSTES, SUM(IMPOSTO) AS IMPOSTO, CASE WHEN :P_ANALISE = 'M' THEN SUM(REPASSE) ELSE 0 END AS REPASSE, SUM(REPASSE_UNI) AS REPASSE_UNI, SUM(CUSTOS) AS CUSTOS, SUM(CUSTOS_SER) AS CUSTOS_SER, SUM(CUSTOS_IND) AS CUSTOS_IND, SUM(DESP_OPER) AS DESP_OPER, SUM(DESP_COM) AS DESP_COM, SUM(DESP_ADM) AS DESP_ADM, SUM(DESP_OUT) AS DESP_OUT, SUM(RESULTADO_FIN) AS RESULTADO_FIN, SUM(REC_FIN) AS REC_FIN, SUM(DESP_FIN) AS DESP_FIN, SUM(IR_S_LCR) AS IR_S_LCR, SUM(CS_S_LCR) AS CS_S_LCR, SUM(DEP_AM_EX) AS DEP_AM_EX FROM CND_DRE2 DRE WHERE DRE.REFERENCIA BETWEEN :P_PERIODO.INI AND :P_PERIODO.FIN AND (DRE.AD_SKJV2 = :P_NEGOCIO OR :P_NEGOCIO = 'A') AND (DRE.NROUNICOBP = :P_UNIDADE OR :P_UNIDADE IS NULL) AND (DRE.CODCENCUS = :P_CR OR :P_CR IS NULL) AND (DECODE(DRE.AD_CATEGORIA, 'I', 'M', DRE.AD_CATEGORIA) = :P_ANALISE OR :P_ANALISE = 'C') AND CODEMP IN :P_EMPRESA /*CERTIFICAÇÃO INICIO*/ AND (CODCENCUS IN (SELECT ITR.CODINSTPRINC FROM TGFREG REG INNER JOIN TGFCER CER ON REG.CODREGRA = CER.CODREGRA INNER JOIN TGFITR ITR ON REG.CODREGRA = ITR.CODREGRA WHERE CER.TIPO = 'U' AND CER.CHAVE = :CODUSU_LOG) OR ((SELECT CRU.NROUNICOBP FROM TSICUS CRU INNER JOIN TSIUSU USL ON USL.CODCENCUSPAD = CRU.CODCENCUS WHERE CODUSU = :CODUSU_LOG) IN (24, 25) AND (SELECT CODCENCUSPAD FROM TSIUSU U WHERE U.CODUSU = :CODUSU_LOG) <> 10001308) OR ((SELECT CODCENCUSPAD FROM TSIUSU U WHERE U.CODUSU = :CODUSU_LOG) = 10001308 AND AD_CATEGORIA = 'U') /*ESTRUTURAÇÃO DE CANAIS*/ OR :CODUSU_LOG = 0) /*CERTIFICAÇÃO FIM*/ GROUP BY REFERENCIA, CODCENCUS, NROUNICOBP, AD_SKJV2, AD_CATEGORIA, CTACTB) SELECT ' (+)Receita Bruta ' AS CONTA, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 01 THEN REC_BRUTA END) || '' AS JAN, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 02 THEN REC_BRUTA END) || '' AS FEV, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 03 THEN REC_BRUTA END) || '' AS MAR, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 04 THEN REC_BRUTA END) || '' AS ABR, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 05 THEN REC_BRUTA END) || '' AS MAI, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 06 THEN REC_BRUTA END) || '' AS JUN, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 07 THEN REC_BRUTA END) || '' AS JUL, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 08 THEN REC_BRUTA END) || '' AS AGO, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 09 THEN REC_BRUTA END) || '' AS SETE, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 10 THEN REC_BRUTA END) || '' AS OUT, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 11 THEN REC_BRUTA END) || '' AS NOV, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 12 THEN REC_BRUTA END) || '' AS DEZ, '' || SUM(REC_BRUTA) AS ACUM FROM VALORES DRE UNION ALL SELECT ' '||DRE.CTACTB|| ' ' ||PLA.DESCRCTA AS CONTA, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 01 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS JAN, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 02 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS FEV, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 03 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS MAR, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 04 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS ABR, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 05 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS MAI, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 06 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS JUN, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 07 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS JUL, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 08 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS AGO, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 09 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS SETE, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 10 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS OUT, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 11 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS NOV, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 12 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS DEZ, '' || SUM(DRE.VLRLANC) AS ACUM FROM CND_DRE0 DRE INNER JOIN TCBPLA PLA ON PLA.CTACTB = DRE.CTACTB WHERE DRE.REFERENCIA BETWEEN :P_PERIODO.INI AND :P_PERIODO.FIN AND (DRE.AD_SKJV2 = :P_NEGOCIO OR :P_NEGOCIO = 'A') AND (DRE.NROUNICOBP = :P_UNIDADE OR :P_UNIDADE IS NULL) AND (DRE.CODCENCUS = :P_CR OR :P_CR IS NULL) AND (((DRE.CTACTB LIKE '7.1.1.01.00001' OR DRE.CTACTB LIKE '7.1.1.01.00002' OR DRE.CTACTB LIKE '3.1.1.01.%') AND :P_ANALISE = 'M') OR ((DRE.CTACTB LIKE '3.1.1.03.%' OR DRE.CTACTB LIKE '3.1.1.01.%') AND :P_ANALISE = 'U') OR ((DRE.CTACTB LIKE '7.1.1.01.00001' OR DRE.CTACTB LIKE '7.1.1.01.00002' OR DRE.CTACTB LIKE '3.1.1.01.%') AND :P_ANALISE = 'C')) AND (DECODE(DRE.AD_CATEGORIA, 'I', 'M', DRE.AD_CATEGORIA) = :P_ANALISE OR :P_ANALISE = 'C') AND DRE.CODEMP IN :P_EMPRESA /*CERTIFICAÇÃO INICIO*/ AND (CODCENCUS IN (SELECT ITR.CODINSTPRINC FROM TGFREG REG INNER JOIN TGFCER CER ON REG.CODREGRA = CER.CODREGRA INNER JOIN TGFITR ITR ON REG.CODREGRA = ITR.CODREGRA WHERE CER.TIPO = 'U' AND CER.CHAVE = :CODUSU_LOG) OR ((SELECT CRU.NROUNICOBP FROM TSICUS CRU INNER JOIN TSIUSU USL ON USL.CODCENCUSPAD = CRU.CODCENCUS WHERE CODUSU = :CODUSU_LOG) IN (24, 25) AND (SELECT CODCENCUSPAD FROM TSIUSU U WHERE U.CODUSU = :CODUSU_LOG) <> 10001308) /*ESTRUTURAÇÃO DE CANAIS*/ OR ((SELECT CODCENCUSPAD FROM TSIUSU U WHERE U.CODUSU = :CODUSU_LOG) = 10001308 AND AD_CATEGORIA = 'U') /*ESTRUTURAÇÃO DE CANAIS*/ OR :CODUSU_LOG = 0) /*CERTIFICAÇÃO FIM*/ GROUP BY DRE.CTACTB, PLA.DESCRCTA UNION ALL SELECT ' (-)Dedutores da Receita Bruta ' AS CONTA, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 01 THEN DEDUTORES END) || '' AS JAN, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 02 THEN DEDUTORES END) || '' AS FEV, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 03 THEN DEDUTORES END) || '' AS MAR, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 04 THEN DEDUTORES END) || '' AS ABR, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 05 THEN DEDUTORES END) || '' AS MAI, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 06 THEN DEDUTORES END) || '' AS JUN, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 07 THEN DEDUTORES END) || '' AS JUL, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 08 THEN DEDUTORES END) || '' AS AGO, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 09 THEN DEDUTORES END) || '' AS SETE, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 10 THEN DEDUTORES END) || '' AS OUT, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 11 THEN DEDUTORES END) || '' AS NOV, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 12 THEN DEDUTORES END) || '' AS DEZ, '' || SUM(DEDUTORES) AS ACUM FROM VALORES DRE HAVING NVL(SUM(DEDUTORES),0) <> 0 UNION ALL SELECT ' (-)' || 'Imposto sobre a Receita' AS CONTA, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 01 THEN IMPOSTO END) AS JAN, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 02 THEN IMPOSTO END) AS FEV, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 03 THEN IMPOSTO END) AS MAR, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 04 THEN IMPOSTO END) AS ABR, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 05 THEN IMPOSTO END) AS MAI, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 06 THEN IMPOSTO END) AS JUN, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 07 THEN IMPOSTO END) AS JUL, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 08 THEN IMPOSTO END) AS AGO, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 09 THEN IMPOSTO END) AS SETE, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 10 THEN IMPOSTO END) AS OUT, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 11 THEN IMPOSTO END) AS NOV, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 12 THEN IMPOSTO END) AS DEZ, '' || SUM(IMPOSTO) AS ACUM FROM VALORES DRE HAVING NVL(SUM(IMPOSTO),0) <> 0 UNION ALL SELECT ' (-)' || 'Repasse' AS CONTA, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 01 THEN REPASSE END) AS JAN, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 02 THEN REPASSE END) AS FEV, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 03 THEN REPASSE END) AS MAR, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 04 THEN REPASSE END) AS ABR, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 05 THEN REPASSE END) AS MAI, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 06 THEN REPASSE END) AS JUN, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 07 THEN REPASSE END) AS JUL, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 08 THEN REPASSE END) AS AGO, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 09 THEN REPASSE END) AS SETE, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 10 THEN REPASSE END) AS OUT, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 11 THEN REPASSE END) AS NOV, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 12 THEN REPASSE END) AS DEZ, '' || SUM(REPASSE) AS ACUM FROM VALORES DRE HAVING NVL(SUM(REPASSE),0) <> 0 UNION ALL SELECT ' '||DRE.CTACTB|| ' ' ||PLA.DESCRCTA AS CONTA, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 01 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS JAN, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 02 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS FEV, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 03 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS MAR, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 04 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS ABR, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 05 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS MAI, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 06 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS JUN, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 07 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS JUL, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 08 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS AGO, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 09 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS SETE, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 10 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS OUT, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 11 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS NOV, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 12 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS DEZ, '' || SUM(DRE.VLRLANC) AS ACUM FROM CND_DRE0 DRE INNER JOIN TCBPLA PLA ON PLA.CTACTB = DRE.CTACTB WHERE DRE.REFERENCIA BETWEEN :P_PERIODO.INI AND :P_PERIODO.FIN AND (DRE.AD_SKJV2 = :P_NEGOCIO OR :P_NEGOCIO = 'A') AND (DRE.NROUNICOBP = :P_UNIDADE OR :P_UNIDADE IS NULL) AND (DRE.CODCENCUS = :P_CR OR :P_CR IS NULL) AND ((DRE.CTACTB LIKE '3.1.1.03%' OR DRE.CTACTB LIKE '7.1.1.03.00002') AND :P_ANALISE = 'M') AND (DECODE(DRE.AD_CATEGORIA, 'I', 'M', DRE.AD_CATEGORIA) = :P_ANALISE OR :P_ANALISE = 'C') AND DRE.CODEMP IN :P_EMPRESA /*CERTIFICAÇÃO INICIO*/ AND (CODCENCUS IN (SELECT ITR.CODINSTPRINC FROM TGFREG REG INNER JOIN TGFCER CER ON REG.CODREGRA = CER.CODREGRA INNER JOIN TGFITR ITR ON REG.CODREGRA = ITR.CODREGRA WHERE CER.TIPO = 'U' AND CER.CHAVE = :CODUSU_LOG) OR ((SELECT CRU.NROUNICOBP FROM TSICUS CRU INNER JOIN TSIUSU USL ON USL.CODCENCUSPAD = CRU.CODCENCUS WHERE CODUSU = :CODUSU_LOG) IN (24, 25) AND (SELECT CODCENCUSPAD FROM TSIUSU U WHERE U.CODUSU = :CODUSU_LOG) <> 10001308) /*ESTRUTURAÇÃO DE CANAIS*/ OR ((SELECT CODCENCUSPAD FROM TSIUSU U WHERE U.CODUSU = :CODUSU_LOG) = 10001308 AND AD_CATEGORIA = 'U') /*ESTRUTURAÇÃO DE CANAIS*/ OR :CODUSU_LOG = 0) /*CERTIFICAÇÃO FIM*/ GROUP BY DRE.CTACTB, PLA.DESCRCTA UNION ALL SELECT ' (-)' || 'Repasse Unidade Terceira' AS CONTA, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 01 THEN REPASSE_UNI END) AS JAN, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 02 THEN REPASSE_UNI END) AS FEV, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 03 THEN REPASSE_UNI END) AS MAR, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 04 THEN REPASSE_UNI END) AS ABR, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 05 THEN REPASSE_UNI END) AS MAI, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 06 THEN REPASSE_UNI END) AS JUN, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 07 THEN REPASSE_UNI END) AS JUL, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 08 THEN REPASSE_UNI END) AS AGO, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 09 THEN REPASSE_UNI END) AS SETE, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 10 THEN REPASSE_UNI END) AS OUT, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 11 THEN REPASSE_UNI END) AS NOV, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 12 THEN REPASSE_UNI END) AS DEZ, '' || SUM(REPASSE_UNI) AS ACUM FROM VALORES DRE HAVING NVL(SUM(REPASSE_UNI),0) <> 0 UNION ALL SELECT ' '||DRE.CTACTB|| ' ' ||PLA.DESCRCTA AS CONTA, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 01 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS JAN, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 02 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS FEV, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 03 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS MAR, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 04 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS ABR, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 05 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS MAI, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 06 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS JUN, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 07 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS JUL, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 08 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS AGO, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 09 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS SETE, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 10 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS OUT, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 11 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS NOV, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 12 THEN DRE.VLRLANC END) AS DEZ, '' || SUM(DRE.VLRLANC) AS ACUM FROM CND_DRE0 DRE INNER JOIN TCBPLA PLA ON PLA.CTACTB = DRE.CTACTB WHERE DRE.REFERENCIA BETWEEN :P_PERIODO.INI AND :P_PERIODO.FIN AND (DRE.AD_SKJV2 = :P_NEGOCIO OR :P_NEGOCIO = 'A') AND (DRE.NROUNICOBP = :P_UNIDADE OR :P_UNIDADE IS NULL) AND (DRE.CODCENCUS = :P_CR OR :P_CR IS NULL) AND DRE.CTACTB IN ('5.1.2.01.00006','4.1.2.01.00006', '5.2.2.01.00006','5.1.2.01.00007', '5.1.2.01.00008', '5.1.2.01.00009', '5.1.2.01.00010', '7.1.1.03.00001') AND (DECODE(DRE.AD_CATEGORIA, 'I', 'M', DRE.AD_CATEGORIA) = :P_ANALISE OR :P_ANALISE = 'C') AND DRE.CODEMP IN :P_EMPRESA /*CERTIFICAÇÃO INICIO*/ AND (CODCENCUS IN (SELECT ITR.CODINSTPRINC FROM TGFREG REG INNER JOIN TGFCER CER ON REG.CODREGRA = CER.CODREGRA INNER JOIN TGFITR ITR ON REG.CODREGRA = ITR.CODREGRA WHERE CER.TIPO = 'U' AND CER.CHAVE = :CODUSU_LOG) OR ((SELECT CRU.NROUNICOBP FROM TSICUS CRU INNER JOIN TSIUSU USL ON USL.CODCENCUSPAD = CRU.CODCENCUS WHERE CODUSU = :CODUSU_LOG) IN (24, 25) AND (SELECT CODCENCUSPAD FROM TSIUSU U WHERE U.CODUSU = :CODUSU_LOG) <> 10001308) /*ESTRUTURAÇÃO DE CANAIS*/ OR ((SELECT CODCENCUSPAD FROM TSIUSU U WHERE U.CODUSU = :CODUSU_LOG) = 10001308 AND AD_CATEGORIA = 'U') /*ESTRUTURAÇÃO DE CANAIS*/ OR :CODUSU_LOG = 0) /*CERTIFICAÇÃO FIM*/ GROUP BY DRE.CTACTB, PLA.DESCRCTA UNION ALL SELECT ' (=)Receita Líquida ' AS CONTA, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 01 THEN RECLIQ END) || '' AS JAN, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 02 THEN RECLIQ END) || '' AS FEV, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 03 THEN RECLIQ END) || '' AS MAR, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 04 THEN RECLIQ END) || '' AS ABR, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 05 THEN RECLIQ END) || '' AS MAI, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 06 THEN RECLIQ END) || '' AS JUN, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 07 THEN RECLIQ END) || '' AS JUL, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 08 THEN RECLIQ END) || '' AS AGO, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 09 THEN RECLIQ END) || '' AS SETE, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 10 THEN RECLIQ END) || '' AS OUT, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 11 THEN RECLIQ END) || '' AS NOV, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 12 THEN RECLIQ END) || '' AS DEZ, '' || SUM(RECLIQ) || '' AS ACUM FROM VALORES DRE UNION ALL SELECT '(-)Custos ' AS CONTA, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 01 THEN CUSTOS END) || '' AS JAN, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 02 THEN CUSTOS END) || '' AS FEV, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 03 THEN CUSTOS END) || '' AS MAR, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 04 THEN CUSTOS END) || '' AS ABR, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 05 THEN CUSTOS END) || '' AS MAI, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 06 THEN CUSTOS END) || '' AS JUN, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 07 THEN CUSTOS END) || '' AS JUL, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 08 THEN CUSTOS END) || '' AS AGO, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 09 THEN CUSTOS END) || '' AS SETE, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 10 THEN CUSTOS END) || '' AS OUT, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 11 THEN CUSTOS END) || '' AS NOV, '' || SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM') = 12 THEN CUSTOS END) || '' AS DEZ, '' ||
